system.description:
The artificer crafts a construct known as a homunculus to perform specialized tasks based on a specific design and function. These tasks can range from carrying and delivering a message to defending their masters from attackers. This works exactly like the Familiar Edge.

Below is a list of homunculi the artificer can craft based on the artificerâ€™s rank.

Rank

Homunculus Types

Seasoned

Dedicated wright, expeditious messenger, furtive filcher

Veteran

Iron Defender

If a homunculus is destroyed, the artificer can craft another, even a different type if desired. This process is exactly like crafting a magical item, and the crafting costs are detailed for each type of homunculus.
